name: Ancient Wizard
description: An elderly wizard with a long white beard and robes decorated with mystical symbols. His eyes glow with arcane knowledge.

dialogue.greeting: Greetings, young one. Seek you the mysteries of magic?

responses.hello: Welcome to my humble shop of wonders and enchantments.
responses.magic: Magic is the force that binds all things. Would you like to learn?
responses.potions: I brew potions of healing and power. Very useful for adventurers.
responses.spells: Ancient spells written on sacred scrolls. Use them wisely.
responses.bye: May the arcane forces guide your path.
